definition: stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns

sentences.english: X axis and Y axis adopt ball spiral rods with excellent precisions and low friction factors.
sentences.chinese: 軸採用滾珠螺桿傳動精度佳，摩擦係數小。

sentences.english: The scanning electronic microscope results showed that double screw blending was better than single screw blending.
sentences.chinese: 雙螺桿共混擠出，掃描電鏡觀察兩相混合效果很好。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the study of the design theory of twin screw pulping machine.
sentences.chinese: 本文對雙螺桿磨漿機的設計理論進行了研究。

sentences.english: The driving system is an important part of twin-screw extruder.
sentences.chinese: 傳動系統是雙螺桿擠出機的一個重要部分。

sentences.english: The method of reverse phase hemagglutination test for serum Helicobacter pylori antigen(HP-RPHA)was founded.
sentences.chinese: 建立反相間接血凝法檢測幽門螺桿菌抗原的方法。

sentences.english: Also inform us what is the maximum size of screws you can make in terms of length and dia .
sentences.chinese: 同樣請告知你們能做螺桿的最大長度和直徑是多少？

sentences.english: We are still learning a lot about the connection between H. pylori infection and gastric cancer.
sentences.chinese: 我們還在繼續研究幽門螺桿菌感染與胃癌之間的關係。

sentences.english: Does Helicobacter pylori eradication therapy for peptic ulcer prevent gastric cancer?
sentences.chinese: 幽門螺桿菌根除治療消化性潰瘍是否能預防胃癌？

sentences.english: Both flexible whorl cover and stern with screw are placed in flexible sealing shell.
sentences.chinese: 柔性螺紋套和帶有螺桿的閥杆均置於柔性密閉殼體中。

sentences.english: Mainly discussed the technical development of the driving system with high torque twin screw extruder.
sentences.chinese: 着重論述了高扭矩雙螺桿擠出機傳動系統的技術發展。

sentences.english: A single screw extruder with heating system was employed in the system.
sentences.chinese: 擠壓設備系一臺帶加熱系統的試驗性單螺桿擠壓機。

sentences.english: The computing procedure of all profiles design for double screw pump has been.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了雙螺桿泵各類型面設計的計算機設計程序。

sentences.english: Therefore, this method is not appropriate as a single-screw adjusting parameters means.
sentences.chinese: 因此，這種方法不宜作爲單螺桿泵調整參數的手段。

sentences.english: The mathematic model of screw processing with the new method has been introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 主要介紹內旋包絡式數控螺桿銑削加工的數學模型。

sentences.english: The dewatered sludge is pushed by the conveying screw past the pressure cone into the discharge chamber.
sentences.chinese: 該脫水污泥是被傳送螺桿推動通過壓力錐進入排放室。

sentences.english: The twin screw reactive extrusion process for nylon 6 inland was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了國內尼龍6的雙螺桿反應擠出工藝。

definition: to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
dip/angle of dip (inclination of a geological plane down from horizontal)/tilt (inclination of ship from vertical)
